about.summary: A Python library for crawling THREDDS servers.

name: thredds_crawler
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "thredds_crawler" %}
{% set version = "1.5.3" %}
{% set sha256 = "b31f9991c4373bfd4e7ee3e8fb320400d709d03e12740d094406316f5cdd3d8f" %}
{% set build = 0 %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/ioos/thredds_crawler/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: {{ build }}
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - requests
    - lxml
    - netcdf4
    - pytz

test:
  imports:
    - thredds_crawler

about:
  home: https://github.com/asascience-open/thredds_crawler
  license: MIT
  summary: 'A Python library for crawling THREDDS servers.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - kwilcox
    - ocefpaf
